title: Off Limits
description: Ranching isn’t easy, especially not in Fork River. The days are long, the competition is ruthless, and there’s always someone out there waiting to take what’s yours.For my family to survive things have to go back to the way they were.The Carsons used to run the town, we were feared, but my father changed that legacy by thinking he could run things legitimately.He lost our power, he lost our control and he lost our respect.Now I’m taking it back…None of us want my father to remarry, and when his new wife moves out here from L.A. she brings her feisty brat of a daughter with her.Maisie couldn’t make it any clearer that she doesn’t want to be here.She’s rude, obnoxious and far too privileged for life on the ranch. But it doesn’t matter how hard I try, I can’t get her out of my head.It’s selfish of me to want her. I’m too old, too short-tempered and the darkness inside me would be destroying.When it comes to her I’ve only got one option.It doesn’t matter how much it hurts, I need to make the girl off limits…*Join these dark, dirty, and corrupt cowboys on the Carson’s ranch. Where boundaries are pushed, laws are broken and limits get tested….This is a Corrupt Cowboys series novella. Due to the nature of the series you should expect to come across subject matter that some readers may find disturbing
author: Emma Creed
